Verses: 1 ivvidhamaaga Vaanamum Boomiyum, Avaigalin Sarvasenaiyum Undaakkappattuth Theerndhana.
2 dhevan Thaam Seydha Thammudaiya Kiriyaiyai Ezhaam Naalile Niraivetri, Thaam Undaakkina Thammudaiya Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Mudiththapinbu, Ezhaam Naalile Oindhirundhaar.
3 dhevan Thaam Sirushtiththu Undupannina Thammudaiya Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Mudiththapinbu Adhile Oindhirundhapadiyaal, Dhevan Ezhaam Naalai Aaseervadhiththu, Adhaip Parisuththamaakkinaar.
4 dhevanaagiya Karththar Boomiyaiyum Vaanaththaiyum Undaakkina Naalile, Vaanamum Boomiyum Sirushtikkappatta Varalaaru Ivaigale.

5 nilaththinudaiya Sagalavidhach Chedigalum Boomiyinmel Innum Undaagavillai, Nilaththinudaiya Sagalavidhap Poondugalum Innum Mulaikkavillai; Enenil Dhevanaagiya Karththar Boomiyinmel Innum Mazhaiyaip Peyyappannavillai; Nilaththaip Panpaduththa Manushanum Irundhadhillai.
6 appozhudhu Moodupani Boomiyilirundhu Ezhumbi, Boomiyaiyellaam Nanaiththadhu.
7 dhevanaagiya Karththar Manushanai Boomiyin Manninaale Uruvaakki, Jeevasvaasaththai Avan Naasiyile Oodhinaar, Manushan Jeevaaththumaavaanaan.
8 dhevanaagiya Karththar Kizhakke Edhen Ennum Oru Thottaththai Undaakki, Thaam Uruvaakkina Manushanai Adhile Vaiththaar.

9 dhevanaagiya Karththar, Paarvaikku Azhagum Pusippukku Nalamumaana Sagalavidha Virutchangalaiyum, Thottaththin Naduvile Jeevavirutchaththaiyum, Nanmai Theemai Ariyaththakka Virutchaththaiyum Boomiyilirundhu Mulaikkappanninaar.
10 thottaththukkuth Thanneer Paayumpadi Edhenilirundhu Oru Nadhi Odi, Angeyirundhu Pirindhu Naalu Periya Aarugalaayitru.
11 mudhalaam Aatrukkup Paison Endru Per, Adhu Aavilaa Dhesam Muzhuvadhaiyum Sutri Odum; Avvidaththile Pon Vilaiyum.
12 andha Dhesaththin Pon Nalladhu; Avvidaththile Pidholaagum, Komedhagak Kallum Undu.
13 irandaam Aatrukkuk Keegon Endru Per, Adhu Eththiyoppiyaa Dhesam Muzhuvadhaiyum Sutri Odum.
14 moondraam Aatrukku Idhekkel Endru Per, Adhu Aseeriyaavukkuk Kizhakke Odum; Naalaam Aatrukku Aibiraaththu Endru Per.
15 dhevanaagiya Karththar Manushanai Edhen Thottaththil Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu, Adhaip Panpaduththavum Kaakkavum Vaiththaar.
16 dhevanaagiya Karththar Manushanai Nokki: Nee Thottaththilulla Sagala Virutchaththin Kaniyaiyum Pusikkave Pusikkalaam.
17 aanaalum Nanmai Theemai Ariyaththakka Virutchaththin Kaniyaip Pusikkavendaam; Adhai Nee Pusikkum Naalil Saagave Saavaai Endru Kattalaiyittaar.
18 pinbu Dhevanaagiya Karththar: Manushan Thanimaiyaayiruppadhu Nalladhalla, Etra Thunaiyai Avanukku Undaakkuven Endraar.

19 dhevanaagiya Karththar Veliyin Sagalavidha Mirugangalaiyum, Aagaayaththin Sagalavidhap Paravaigalaiyum Manninaale Uruvaakki, Aadhaam Avaigalukku Enna Periduvaan Endru Paarkkumpadi Avaigalai Avanidaththil Konduvandhaar; Andhandha Jeevajandhukku Aadhaam Endhendhap Perittaano Adhuve Adharkup Peraayitru.
20 appadiye Aadhaam Sagalavidha Naattumirugangalukkum, Aagaayaththup Paravaigalukkum, Sagalavidhak Kaattumirugangalukkum Perittaan; Aadhaamukko Etra Thunai Innum Kaanappadavillai.

21 appozhudhu Dhevanaagiya Karththar Aadhaamukku Ayarndha Niththiraiyai Varappanninaar, Avan Niththiraiyadaindhaan; Avar Avan Vilaa Elumbugalil Ondrai Eduththu, Andha Idaththai Sadhaiyinaal Adaiththaar.
22 dhevanaagiya Karththar Thaam Manushanil Eduththa Vilaa Elumbai Manushiyaaga Uruvaakki, Avalai Manushanidaththil Konduvandhaar.
23 appozhudhu Aadhaam: Ival En Elumbil Elumbum, En Maamsaththil Maamsamumaai Irukkiraal; Ival Manushanil Edukkappattapadiyinaal Manushi Ennappaduvaal Endraan.
24 idhinimiththam Purushan Than Thagappanaiyum Than Thaayaiyum Vittu, Than Manaiviyode Isaindhiruppaan; Avargal Ore Maamsamaayiruppaargal.
25 aadhaamum Avan Manaiviyumaagiya Iruvarum Nirvaanigalaayirundhum, Vetkappadaadhirundhaargal.
